title: Sri Lanka bond yields flat, indicative dollar at Rs.229.5
body_lines: ECONOMYNEXT – Sri Lanka bond yields were quoted flat in mid-day trading on Wednesday (09), dealers said while the central bank’s indicative spot rate moved up.
In debt markets, a bond maturing on 01/08/2025 quoted flat at 13.00/13.10 percent on Wednesday.
The average buying rate for telegraphic transfers at banks was 225.2013 and the selling rate was 229.9987.
The central bank’s indicative spot rate on Wednesday (09) was 229.5 up from 202.0909 on Tuesday (08). (Colombo/March 09/2022)
